project.name: ombudsman
project.author: Grant Goodyear
project.description: The Gentoo ombudsman mediates disputes between Gentoo Linux Developers.

longdescription.p: Given the impressive number of Gentoo developers, it is inevitable that occasional clashes will occur between developers and managers and between developers and developers. Establishment of an official ombudsman--one who has been assigned to impartially investigate complaints and settle disputes--is one mechanism to prevent such disputes from escalating out of control. Developers who need to voice a concern (anything from technical disagreements to worries about developer burn-out) are welcome and encouraged to do so by sending an e-mail to ombudsman@gentoo.org.
An additional, and perhaps even more important, job of the ombudsman is to look for sources of interpersonal friction, and then to attempt to ameliorate matters well before tempers begin to flare.
Establishment of a Gentoo Ombudsman was first proposed in GLEP 7.
